text: Roswell Pettibone Flower (August 7, 1835 - May 12, 1899) was the 30th Governor of New York from 1892 to 1894. He was a Democrat. The Roswell P. Flower Memorial Library was made by his daughter, Emma Flower Taylor, as a tribute to him. ==References== Category:1835 births Category:1899 deaths Category:Governors of New York (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:19th-century American politicians
title: Roswell P. Flower
